UserID.description: The unique identifier for the user.

EmailAddress.description: The email address of the user.

FirstName.description: The first name of the user.

LastName.description: The last name of the user.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The date and time when the user data was last updated.

IsSubscriber.description: Indicates if the user is a subscriber or not.

OrganisationRole.description: The role of the user within the organization.

ValidationErrors.description: Any validation errors associated with the user data.
